Hellplague:
 
"Yes," the femme said in response to her master's initial question.
She turned to Blacknightmare.
"Could you excuse us, sister?"

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Unicron:

"Do you like play with your preys, eh Hell plague?"said the hologran 
laughting"Thn here is your mission"said while a screen in the room 
appeared a massicve weaponin built"Destroy this... this weapon may be 
destined to destroy us... Hell Plague, you will lead the battle but a 
part of you my minions will be the refoircments... and they would be 
leaded by Malice... HellPlague,I need to chat with ya, before go"
